name: NeXt-DeFi Protocol
description: NXDF offers people world-class digital art/real-estate NFTs powered by DeFi Magic on Solana. People can sell and buy realistic virtual real estate property in the metaverse called Artistalla. No complex instruction is necessary to trade your NFT assets. Super easy mobile wallet and mobile DEX help people to trade digital assets. Yield farming and staking reward from what you play in the metaverse are our tokenomic finance systems.
